title: Chamizal National Memorial: Guest Speakers
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Guest Speakers                Ranger in the Classroom       Consider inviting a Chamizal Ranger to your school or event. Reserve your ranger at least two weeks in advance by contacting Kathy Denton at 915-532-7273 ext. 130 or e-mail us. Ranger visits are perfect for Career, Science, or Health Fairs. The Ranger presentations will include *Arrowhead Talk, *Story of Chamizal National Memorial and *Topic tailored to the appropriate grade-level of your students. This topic could include: desert ecosystems, animal adaptations, or river behavior (as it applies to Chamizal). "Writing a Resum√© for Government Employment" is available for high school students by scheduling a workshop with Kathy. (See Government Job Application Website). Other topics are available by contacting Kathy well in advance of your planned outreach. Other programs available as Ranger Outreach are Every Kid in a Park, 2016 NPS Centennial, and Find Your Park.
